alert.note: Alert for Harper; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 12:38AM CDT until August 06 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harper County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1238 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located scattered along a line extending from 6 miles south of Nashville to 8 miles northeast of Wakita, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Anthony, Harper, Caldwell, Attica, Argonia, Bluff City, Danville, Waldron, Freeport, Corwin, Runnymede and Crystal Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
